timeline.message:
[FLINK-18534][kafka][table] Fix unstable KafkaTableITCase.testKafkaDebeziumChangelogSource

This fix the unstable test with "Topic 'changelog_topic' already exists" exception

timeline.bodyHTML:
How about add format:

protected static final String DEBEZIUM_JSON = "debezium-json";
....
//add parameters
new Object[]{false, DEBEZIUM_JSON}
...
	@Test
	public void testKafkaSourceSink() throws Exception {
		if (DEBEZIUM_JSON.equals(format)) {
			// skip debezium json format
			return;
		}
       ....

And then the testKafkaDebeziumChangelogSource will be more clear like:

if (isLegacyConnector || !DEBEZIUM_JSON.equals(format)) {
			// skip tests for legacy connector, because changelog source is only supported in new connector
			return;
		}
timeline.author: leonardBang

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
protected static final String JSON_FORMAT = "json";
private static final String JSON_FORMAT = "json";
timeline.author: leonardBang
